data.title: ITI College in Shamli
meta_keywords: List of Institutes For Iti in Shamli
data.meta_description: Government ITI and Private ITI in Shamli Utter Padesh provideng technical education for student according to Latest NSQF Level under NCVT. ITI College in Shamliis employment based Vocational Training Program under Skill Development Mission Government of India. Objectve of ITI in Shamli To develop Training Capacity of Trades which are being operated in Government Industrial
data.text:
Government ITI and Private ITI in Shamli Utter Padesh provideng technical education for student according to Latest NSQF Level under NCVT. ITI College in Shamliis employment based Vocational Training Program under Skill Development Mission Government of India.

Objectve of ITI in Shamli

To develop Training Capacity of Trades which are being operated in Government Industrial Institute.

Benefit of ITI Training in Shamli

Employment opportunities for I.T.I. trained youth in Government Sectors like- Railways, Army, Navy, Air Force, PWD, Irrigation, Vocational Education Department, Technical Education Department etc.

Employment opportunities for I.T.I. trained youth in Semi-Government/Corporation/Council Sectors like BHEL, UPPCL, Defence Factory, HMT, HAL, SAIL, GAIL, ONGC, NTPC etc.

Employment opportunities for I.T.I. trained boys/girls in several prestigious private organisations like- Tata Motors, Maruti Suzuki, Hundai, Escorts, Reliance, Aditya Birla, Honda, Essar, L&T, ITC, Mahindra & Mahindra, Jindal, Wipro, Infosy, Videocon etc.

Training of ITI in Shamli is helpful in Self-Employment also.

Loan without guarantee is available to I.T.I. trained people for self-employment under Mudra loan Scheme by government.

Free books are available for reading and study in the library of I.T.I.

Scholarship/Fee Reimbursement provision as per the rules at State Government during the training of I.T.I.

Free training to S.C./S.T. trainees.

Facilities to Women in Shamli

12 special Government Industrial Training Institutes are established across the state for women and 47 women branches of Government Industrial Training Institutes are established in state.

Other facilities for I.T.I. Shamli Training

43 Government Industrial Training Institutes are established in the minority areas of the state.

Under the Special Component Sub Plan (S.C.S.P.) scheme of state government, a total of 84 institutions are being operated specifically for the scheduled caste / tribe candidates. In these institutes out of approved seats, 70 percent of the seats are reserved for Scheduled Castes / Scheduled Tribes trainees and 15 percent of seats are reserved for trainees of Other Backward Classes.

ITI Government College in Shamli

Govt ITI College in Shamli under NCVT is according to Latest NSQF Level.
